Blackfang: Slag! Kenzo, it's coming back online! We need to give it 
some energy so it can perform the auto-repair... Ah! I have an idea!

He took a power cable from a wall and connected it to the pod. He then 
rushed to try and get the pod to repair itself.

Blackfang: If you can do anything more, just tell me, okay?
